description: Dies ist ein virtueller Safari-Cache. Es ist nicht an einen festen Ort gebunden, sondern kann an verschiedenen Orten gelÃ¶st werden. name: Allsehendes Auge (Safari) von Landschildkroete

logs.message: N51Â° 10.379Â  E7Â° 05.656I hadn't expected to be able to log this safari so easily, but last night I had word (and sight) of an all-seeing eye very close to home, at Gustav-Coppel-Park in Solingen. Today, on a last-minute Xmas shopping trip I cycled by this spont and took two pics.TFTC & greets from "Blade City" Solingen!Cache #7500 (approx.)+++++++++++++++++++++++Liebe
